partnerDetails.about:
Our company has been engaged in electrical installations in the building, industry and tertiary sector for 20 years, providing solutions to its clients in fields such as maintenance and conservation, low and medium voltage electrical distribution, automation and industrial control, public address, CCTV, fiber optic computer networks, structured cabling and Wi-Fi solutions. Our activity in recent years has been closely linked to energy efficiency, alternative energy, device connectivity, switchgear and electrical equipment solutions as well as the installation and programming of charging points for electric vehicles

We have our own facilities in the industrial area of Cadiz, where our offices and the electrical panel workshop are located, a large fleet of vehicles to meet your needs at any point in Andalusia as well as extensive professional equipment. We are highly committed to the client with a vocation for service and high professional training acquired through academic preparation and continuous training acquired with experience.

We have implemented and certified by Bureau Veritas, the quality systems under ISO 9001: 2015, environmental environment ISO 14001: 2015 and management of occupational risk prevention under ISO 45.001: 2018, with which we have managed to acquire a culture business based on continuous improvement focused on customer satisfaction.
